page.title: 03PEOPLE
page.content: The longest time anyone has lived in Barling is 35 years.The shortest time anyone has lived in Barling is 2 months.The majority of people have lived in Barling for 2_10 years. Where people had children most had 2. Some had 1 child. There was one family with 6 children. Of the people we interviewed 1/5 were retired so 4/5 were working, most of them out side the village.The main place where people worked was in Southend. A number of people from Barling and Wakering shop in Shoebury and quite a few shop in Southend but hardly any shop elsewhere. In their spare time many people like gardening.Other people like walking, reading, keeping fit, cooking, knitting and decorating.
